review: The interface is a bit confusing and ill organized, but I enjoy what it's capable of. I wish it were easier to use (the way it's set up is a bit confusing, like compiling a place where all of your apps are neatly organized), but I use this all of the time. It has a really great selection of apps, though I only ever use Netflix, Prime, YouTube, and MLB.tv.It's a bit expensive, that's my only major dislike.
